hero.name: Martin
hero.description: I create stellar web experiences with modern technologies. Specializing in front-end development, I build interfaces that are both beautiful and functional.

itemsLeft.p1: With over 5 years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating responsive, accessible, and performant web applications using modern technologies.
itemsLeft.p2: I'm passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems, and I'm constantly learning new technologies and techniques to stay at the forefront of the ever-evolving web landscape.

i1.c: Creating responsive websites and web applications with modern frameworks.

i2.c: Designing intuitive user interfaces and seamless user experiences.

i3.c: Leading projects from conception to completion with agile methodologies.

projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects. Each project was carefully crafted with attention to detail, performance, and user experience.

p1.title: Movie and Series manager
p1.description: The app allows users to add, mark, edit and delete new movies or series.

p2.title: DinoWiki
p2.description: A SPA that consumes data from a simulated API, including other functionalities.

p3.title: Personal Portfolio
p3.description: The page you are right now! Constant updates of my own progress and persistance.

contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to discussing new opportunities.

form.title: Send a Message
form.placeholder3: Hello, I'd like to talk about...
form.toastDescription: Thank you for your message. I'll get back to you soon.

notFound.message: The requested page or resource does not exist
